GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
mISDN: fix possible memory leak in mISDN_dsp_element_register()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 727ed7d28348c026c7ef4d852f3d0e5054d376e8, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit 1fa5ae857bb14f6046205171d98506d8112dd74e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mISDN: fix possible memory leak in mISDN_dsp_element_register()
